      • addVerifierToEvent

        void addVerifierToEvent(IVerifier<T> theVerifier,
                      int theEventType)
        Add a verifier to an event. If the event is raised, the verifier will be triggered. For each event type the add order is considered.
        Parameters:
        theVerifier - verifier to add for verification
        theEventType - the event, which triggers the verification
        See Also:
        SWT, Control
